title: what a shame riot!
body:
today I was about to log in and play like any other day and it says: an unexpected error occurred while logging in. then I checked support.riotgames.com and guess what?
it says :
due to U.S laws and regulations, players in your country can't access LOL at this time...
LOL was the last game I loved playing and now it says u can't play just cuz ur from IRAN
is that fair? 
 u guys call yourselves human right defenders!  
it's a shame that I can't access LOL, youtube, fortnite and almost anything on the net just cuz I'm living in a country that u don't like!

replies.body:
So, it doesn't sound like this is an OCE thing at all so you'll likely have better luck over on NA boards.

This also sounds like a legal issue and not something Riot has any control over.
